reviews.review: Polecam.

Ну,вообще,ДБД,как по мне,игра топовая,заслуживает уважения с моей и вашей сторон. Чем прекрасна эта игра? (Внимание,это лично моё мнение,я не пытаюсь никого оскорбить,обидеть и т.д.)
1) Графика. Я лично не графикодрочер,и по этому как считаю я - Графика на высшем уровне.
2) Задумка. Как таковая имеется,и реализована отлично! 4 против 1. Вы можете примерить на себя роль как жертвы,так и убийцы. Так же можете играть с друзьями или же против них.
3) Система прокачки. Игра имеет свою систему прокачки,довольно таки неплохо реализованную.
4) Геймплей. Геймплей продуман,сделан простенько,но "На ура".
5) Персонажи. У всех персонажей есть свои особенности,навыки,умения,история.
6) Цена (Да,я жирный еврей,ценю игры в основном по ценам). Цена даже очень хорошая для такой игры. Малая цена за шедевральный товар;

Ну а теперь к обратной стороне луны :
1) Баги. Серьёзно,их тут настолько много,что с ума сойти можно. Большинство багов очень даже весёлые,но люди в основном смотрят на плохое. Смешные баги - Застрял в досках,мгновенно завёл генератор. Плохие - непрогруз,вылет (В основном зависит от вашего капухтера,но всё-таки хромает оптимизация). Бесящие - улетел под карту и умер,вылет с катки во время игры с другом,во время игры за маньяка выкинуло в меню,"синхронизация со Steam Cloud" (Кто сталкивался поймёт),баг ворот/генераторов.
2) Community. Эту игру меняет комьюнити И ТОЛЬКО! Игра построена полностью на мультиплеере,оффлайн игры как таковой нет,по этому зависит она только от "Населения" этой игры. Сейчас всё подробно распишу
     I) Играешь за маньяка,повесил выжившего : Проверил вокруг крюка,есть ли ему подобные - Кемпер. Прошёл мимо крюка с выжившим - кемпер. (Для тех кто не знает : кемпер - мразь,портящяя игру тем,что стоит прямо рядом с крюком,не давая спасать жертву другим жертвам,стоит прямо перед крюком,что вообще не даёт снять выжившего (Конечно это уже пофиксили,теперь крюк можно вращать на 180,но всё-равно,неприятно) и вообще мразь ужасная,не будьте такими.),да и вообще - одно "неверное" действие - клеймо кемпера на всю оставшуюся жизнь и -rep на стенку.)
     II) Выжившие - в большинстве случаев если тебя повесили на крюк ты провисишь там пока тебя не сожрёт "Сущность". Спасать тоже не все умеют - Насрать что рядом маньяк гуляет по опушке,в 3 метрах от крюка,тебя будут снимать ценой ТВОЕЙ жизни,если тебя конечно успеют спасти. Если же нет - "за плечо хвать,на крюк второй пошёл!".
Больше пока не буду писать про них,чего спойлерить,сами ощутите потом.
     III) Ливеры - "Бля,что за гавно игра,не могу поймать этих выживших,пока за этим "кровавым" гадо гонялся завели 4 генера,а я его даже не ударил. Пока гонялся ещё и капканы сломали,твари. ПОШЛИ ВЫ НАХУЙ!!! " /leave.
 "Сука,ебаный маньяк,как же ты меня так быстро поймал,всё,не буду с тобой играть! Чё за херня? Вроде на 20 ранге катаю,а такие сильные уроды мне хуи в очко пихают уже который раз,я уже очка и глотки не чувствую,ливну-ка я нахер,не могу играть,тем более катка идёт уже 10 секунд! Затянулось чёт." /leave
 "Так,началась игра,я одержимость,так,ага,ебать,аааа,сука,поймали меня,ну ничего,ща проверку реакции пройду и свалю под шумок - "Проверка реакции провалена" - МЛЯЯЯЯЯЯ!!! " /leave 
  И таких случаев дохера и больше.
   IV) Фармеры. Пидоры в сговоре с маньяком / выжившим. Палят союзников,а сами потом делают съебейтен. А ещё они мрази. ;

3) Баланс. Ну тут спорно. Ты ман 15 ранга,против тебя сурв 1 ранга. Вот и случай из статьи выше или проигрыш.
Ты выживший 16 ранга,против тебя престижный ман 1 ранга. Пизда тебе 1 словом.




В общем - то и всё. Игра очень классная,очень затягивает. 6 плюсов на 3 минуса. Игра 12 из 10. Спасибо разработчикам,что дали нам всем такой Щидевир
Zajebiste
Игра действительно хорошо по сравнению с той же Пятницой,и в ней хорошо всё кроме подбора игроков,ибо когда у тебя всего 70 часов и ты играешь против стримера с 1750 ч,то это полный п****ц!
Довольно интересный хоррор. Можно побегать от маньяка с незнакомыми людьми или с друзьями . Жаль что у меня нет друзей.

실력차에 대한 매칭이 구분이 잘 되야 하는데..그게 잘 안되는게 문제..

비슷한 유저끼리 즐겨야 제대로 재미를 느낄 수 있는대 실력차가 나버리면
너무 고통스러운 게임이 된다.

랭크 다운을 힘들게 하고, 랭크 초기화 정말 안했으면 좋겠다.

I like that this game has no definite end. This means that it can be played indefinitely. However, its simple community can easily be misinterpreted. Opposing players will generally reciprocate or escalate eachother's actions. If you are rude and boastful, the opposing player(s) will likely reciprocate your rudeness. And in the case that you are kind and sportsman-like, you will often be met with the same sportmanship. However, some people may be upset about losing and will respond to kindness with indifference (Which is still better than rage)

I don't recommend this game to people who are overly boastful or easily angered. This community often vexes pride and weakness. No one likes being looked down on, and people like to poke fun at fragile personalities.

It's best to remain positive and sportsman-like to assure others that you see them as equals. If you can do that, then you will have no problem with this community. (But only you can determine if you like this game and its features)

I have recently got this game and I'm having a blast! It is honestly one of the best games I have ever played so far in 2017. I must admit, it does feel like the killers that you could buy with real money seems kind of like a pay 2 win situation. The killers you can buy are way too over powered and I feel like they should be nerfed. Even though these problems seem pretty big it can't defeat how fun this game really is.  The purpose is too activate 5 generator and escape from the killers' grasps. You play with 4 other people(can be your friends), and you whole main goal is to survive and get out of the terrible and scary environment. Sometimes you will even maybe jump a little while playing this game and it sometimes leaves me sitting on the edge of my seat when the killer is chasing me. 

Overall this game is a blast to play with friends and just play in general. I do wish they would nerf the buyable killers but at this current state of the game it doesn't seem to bad, it may cause some frustration sometimes but in the end of the day you'll get over it. I would totally recommend this game, do not hesitate to buy it at all, it will probably be one the most fun games you will ever play. 

Dear Devs, if you see this please take into consideration that the killers you can buy cause some frustration and they feel like they are pay to win sometimes, I know you guys probably won't see this but, if you do, please take it into consideration.

Overall I give this game a 9/10 and I am looking forward to playing it even more.

Oyun tam anlamıyla bir rezalet ve aşırı sıkıcı.SİNİRDEN LAPTOPUMA YUMRUK ATIP HARDDİSKMİ KIRDIM VE TROLL OYNAYIP REPORTLANDIĞIM VE GEÇMİŞTE STEAM ACHİVEMENT İLE BAŞARIM HİLESİ YAPTIĞIM İÇİN BAN YEDİM.  BAŞTAN SÖYLEYİM, HİÇBİR DLC'YE PARA FALAN VERMEYİN HEPSİ ÇÖPTÜR. HİÇBİR KATİL DLC'Sİ  GÜÇLÜ DEĞİL. PARA VERMEYİN.ÇOK PİŞMAN OLURSUNUZ. Oyunda 2 mod vardır. Survivor ve katil ve ikisini de anlatmak istiyorum.

KATİL: Katil oynamak gerçekten de çok güzel. Fakat survivorlar eğer ki çok deneyimli deilse.   Survivorlar her zaman sizden üstün. Her zaman sizinle dalga geçip moral bozmak için oynuyolar oyunu. 1 tane yeteneksiz aptalın teki 1 flaş alır tüm paletlerde tutar derken sinir küpü olur çıkarsınız, bir oyunda 3 decisive yersiniz delirirsiniiz, adamı kancaya asarken birden tüm takım sizi blocklar ve sırtınızdaki adam kaçar, bazıları o kadar güzel pozisyonda kovalanmaya başlar ki, 5 jeneratör boyunca kovalatır, aptal bir pencerede bile 10 kere döndürür sizi.  Zaten oyunun kitlesi 15 yaşındaki toxicler. Ochido hayranı 5iq lu aptal çocuklar 2 palet indiriyor diye kendisini pro zannediyor.  İstiyorsanız dünyanın en iyi hillbilly'si olun.  survivorlar birlikte oynuyorlarsa 5 jeneratörü daha siz 2 adamı asarken bitiriyorlar.  size hiçbir şey kalmıyor bile. 

SURVİVOR: Başta zerre keyif almadan oynadım. katil sürekli öldürüyordu beni ama Tek motivasyonum "Ee biraz iyi oynayınca severim kötü oynuyorum" görüşüydü.  Zamanla saatlerimi verdim ve çok iyi oynamaya, hatta yeri gelince katile 5 generatör yaptırmaya başladım. Değdi mi? Hayır. aynı sıkıcı terane, rezalet sıkıcı oyun. 

anca akradaşlarla muhabetlee gider, diğer türlü sıkıcı ve berbat.
nice game, having fun for some houres!

If variety is the spice of life, then this game is Dead indeed. This game suffers from lack of content and monotonous mechanics. If you enjoy running in circles, quicktime events that do nothing, and watching a bar load five times every single match, then this game is for you. If you want to do anything else, then look for a different game. Each match is nearly identical.  The models for objects like the sheds, corrugated metal sheets, and generators are reused in each map so even if the scenery is different, it feels like the same old thing. The killers are too similar and their special skills barely affect the gameplay. The skills you get as a survivor are only nominal and also have little affect on the gameplay. The controls are insultingly clunky for a game released in 2016. The premise was so promising, it's a pity that this is the result of their interesting concept.

If you enjoy the rush of being chased, then i suggest this game. There is faults and part of the community may be a bit toxic but i enjoy it regardless. It is fun to play with friends! so i highly recommend playing with some!

Update 1000 Hours: Still playing the game, it is still enjoyable but i still highly recommended playing with friends.
I enjoy this game a lot and really love the sound track of DBD tooo much

If you enjoy playing against OP killers and dealing with some of the worst teamwork from grouping up with randoms I have ever seen in any game then buy this game. Did you know that if a killer see's that you joined up with a group of friends they will back out of the match and make you have to Re-Que. The que for survivors takes forever so once you get in a match you will probably get killed anyways but thats ok because its about the points, not surviving. Sure you get more points if you live but that just hurts when you hanging on a hook and the teamate could try  and save you, but they run off and escape through the escape hatch after you die....  thats more points. Rewards for being a bad teamate. So now all the people who make this game toxic are gonna complain that this review is stupid but it's not..... it's and honest review. The game is fun and I have put a ton of hours into it with friends, but I don't think I enjoyed most of that. Buy it on sale and give it a shot but don't be upset about skipping it. This game is past its lifespan. Because of my gametime I put in I want to say I recommend this but I won't do it.

Update: Had a string of matches where the killer (who could one shot because thats FUN!) would hook a survivor and stare at them till they died. They always got at least two before we escaped. So that was cool.

At first I recommended this game..but after a bit more time I have to say I can't anymore. DBD loses a lot of the tension and horror after a while and the matchmaking system makes it worse. Early players will often be put into groups of extremely skilled ones with abilities that pretty much neutralize your play no matter what you do. The game has no communication system so although survivors have to work together, they can never talk or communicate. Killers can secure kills easily simply by camping, which survivors hate and will call you out or report you for even though this is a tactic the game fully supports and promotes. This game goes from fun to dull and boring fast.

This is a game better suited to watching on a stream than playing it. Even though Friday the 13th is a buggier game, it is still a lot more fun to play than this.

这游戏真的超棒！
小萌新在玩这个游戏时候还是4月份，那个时候啥都不懂，啊啊啊啊屠夫大大怎么就发现我了，啊啊啊啊我上树了，上树三挣扎一放手，队友可以说毫无游戏体验。
后来慢慢明白了一些游戏讨论，开始会在lt、小白房和屠夫van游戏[strike]喜闻乐见的上树被鞭尸[/strike][spoiler]鞭尸不好的！屠夫大大我萌新心很痛！[/spoiler]
就小萌新觉得自己啊终于渐入佳境了呢 。100小时的时候，游戏给我开了一个天大的玩笑，我被吞档了，而且日理万机的官方，并不理我。好吧日子要继续的， 带着过去一百小时的经验我们再战。
通过游戏认识了很多好玩有趣的人，我们天天语音开黑玩，遛屠夫[spoiler]然后上树[/spoiler]，一起逃出去
在300多个小时的时候，终于上了一段，圆了自己的梦想，但是杀机还远没有结束。
我还会继续继续玩下去的，虽然我玩什么都菜，还被挂了起来

Every patch just makes the game worse. The devs have shown their incompetance over time by being unable to fix bugs, repeatedly making bad design choices, and just overall creating an awful game from a great concept. Don't think about being able to win without paying for dlc's to get perks, or by playing for hours on end to be able to get some good ones from the in-game currency. I've supported this game for a long time, but I really don't have anything good to say about it anymore. Just buy White Noise 2, it's literally just a better (and cheaper) version of Dead by Daylight.
winnerwinner,chickendinner，来自拉斯维加斯赌场。因为几十年前，赌钱最低赢一把能赚2刀，一份鸡肉饭是1.75刀，因此该词常常成为当时求好运的一个说法
好游戏值得大家一起玩，虽然BUG多，相信制作组总有一天更新完的，加油

While the game bugs out fairly often, reportedly even deleting save data, the gameplay itself makes up for it.

Playing as survivor leaves you in an almost powerless position, left to your wits and whatever you can find to make it out alive. The intense moments you'll have while hiding, running and outsmarting killers are the best part of playing survivor.

Being killer is on the polar opposite. You are almost all powerful, with only the occasional pallet to slow you down in your hunt for your prey. Predicting what survivors are and will do is much of the game here, along with intense chases.

Overall Dead by Daylight makes an amazing first time expirience, and while it doesn't neccesarily get better as you go it does hold its ground well enough.

Edit: Now that I have played the game for more than 50 hours, here's what I think of it:

As many others have said, killers are not feared. They are simply along for the ride as survivors loop them into the ground, only to use crutch second chance perks in order to get away. It's only when a survivor screws up that the killer has a chance to get them.

Does this mean that playing survivor is easy? Not exactly. It's still up to the killer whether or not to tunnel you for the whole match, and ultimately there are only so many pallets you can throw.

Does all of this mean that Dead by Daylight is a bad game? I really don't think so. Even some 550 hours in, I still enjoy the game greatly. It's no longer scary to play survivor like it once was, but that doesn't make it not fun. The way I enjoy the game has changed. No longer am I tensing up when the killer gets near, but instead feeling great when I manage to save my team mate off of the hook, or juke a particularly good killer. Same goes for killer. It's not just about killing everyone, but doing what you want to get done. Someone looping you the whole match? Either leave them alone and try to get others, or count it as a win if you manage to tunnel them until their demise. 4 man swf Squadettes may be an utter pain in the ass, but when you manage to get them it's extremely satisfying.

I still think that Dead by Daylight is an amazing first 50 hours, but whether you will enjoy it up into the 100's is really up to you. I know that for me it won't be getting old any time soon. For those of you that decide to buy this, or just keep playing, see you in the fog.

Edit: I now have 1700 hours in this game and I hate but I keep playing 10/10 would slow down gens just a lil' bit again.

The game is great! The community really isn't like what I was initially left to believe. There are some obvious things that need to be implemented / fixed that the devs seem to be putting off, but name a multiplayer game that doesn't have this issue. 

Just about every match keeps you on the edge of your seat, whether you're playing as a survivor or the killer. The ranking system seems to do well enough at keeping the hardcore and casual gamers separated, so really anybody can pick up and play with others at the same skill level.

Definitely a recommend from me.

ITs a good game ever

Everyone always complains about all the bugs and how the community is so toxic. I play hours on end with my friends and rarely ever experience that many bugs and we might find one or two people who are upset. Honestly just ignore all the shit about how toxic the community is because it's mostly just people who get triggered quite easily. Have a nice day :)

This game is pretty difficult for new people to learn and get good at. Yes, I've looked at the tutorial, but it's still very difficult to play. If you're new, people with perks will just make the game way too hard to get into. Community tends to be very toxic as well. I've noticed a few bugs but they don't seem too bad.

One extra thing that irritates me is that when you are in a party, you can't stay with them once you exit to the lobby.

The good thing about this game, however, is that it has more depth than the average survivor game. There's a lot of customization for your bloodweb. The survivor perks are pretty unique. It's just not for me, though. The game takes way too long for beginners to even breach the skill floor. It's a massive information overload to try and understand everything about the best strategies, killers, perks, etc.

Too bad there's only a "yes" or "no" recommendation setting, because I personally wanted to give it a neutral rating, but I've decided to hit "No" because dying and losing over and over just isn't fun.

很好玩的游戏，近期一直沉迷。
也因为这个游戏认识了几个新的好朋友，每天都在一起战斗，修发电机，遛屠夫，拆图腾，找地窖。也经常被屠夫挂上树，被处决。但无论是遇到怎样的局面，大家一起玩，总是欢乐的。
也许有一天，慢慢的我们都不会再玩这个游戏，慢慢的我们也会渐行渐远，慢慢失联。可是我永远都会记得你们的呀，我们的黎明杀鸡小分队永远都停在现在这最快乐的时光里。你们也永远都会停在我的记忆里呢。
